mapper.insert: insert into device_record (id, device_id, patient_id, event, details, modify_time, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{event,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update device_record set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, event = #{event,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, details = #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, device_id, patient_id, event, details, modify_time, create_time from device_record
